reviewText: Best DVD you will ever buy!!!  Buy one for yourself and one for everyone you know. Recently purchased a copy for my mother.  She loved it so much, she purchased one for my grandmother.  Thank you Mentors.  RIP Sir Duce
there is no reason for a pediantic deconstruction of any work by the Mentors; you love it, or as El Duce said so succinctly so many different ways **** you, tiny ****bag

It's okay but it's mostly just a reissue of the Wretched World of The Mentors with a few live performances added nothing special mostly videos they use to show on Night Flight on the USA network you'd be better off tracking down the Wretched World DVD.

Old material, but good production value on the DVD.  The band's been around so long now that we're introducing their legacy to our adult children, and a fresh DVD helps keep the message of the Mentors more contemporary than the dusty VHS's.

El Duce Vita AS A FAN OF THE MENTORS, I WAS VERY DISSAPOINTED TO SEE THE SAME OLD RECYCLED MATERIAL FROM OTHER RECENT DVDS, MOST FANS SHOULD ALREADY HAVE THIS STUFF ON DVD, WRETCHED WORLD, LIVE 7TH ST.ENTRY 91, NOT EVEN COMPLETE CONCERTS ON THIS DVD, IT WOULD HAVE BEEN NICE TO SEE THEM IN THEIR EARLY PERFORMANCES 77-86, THIS DVD DOESN'T LET THE FAN SEE THE MAN EL DUCE REALLY WAS, NO HOME FOOTAGE, NO STUDIO STUFF, LETS HOPE THEIR NEXT DVD MAKES UP FOR THIS CRAPPY RIPOFF OF A DVD, NOT WORTH THE PRICE I PAID, SHOW US FANS SOMETHING WE DON'T ALREADY HAVE!!!!!
